title: virus?
body:
Hello all, 

Recently my friend and I have been spammed in our chat window with the following message: [REMOVED] this is clearly a fake link. My chat window received this message from a known friend of mine first on 5/8/2017 and twice today 7/08/2017 we have both since changes passwords and are scanning for malware and viruses. The chat window doesn't show myself sending them only that I have received them and same for my friend. Has anyone else encountered this problem? Is RIOT aware that this is an issue? I cant seem to find any relevant information at this point in time.

Cheers

Edit: DO NOT CLICK THIS LINK IF YOU RECEIVE IT AND LET THE SENDER KNOW ITS HAPPENING AND DO SCANS AND CHANGE YOUR PASSWORD ASAP

replies.body:
Hey there,

Feel sorry for you and your friend. People just need to stop doing this sort of stuff. If you do get this link again, please head over to https://www.virustotal.com/#/home/url and scan the link to see whether there is a virus or not. Also, ensure that you have enable Leagues built in link prevention message tool.

Thanks
Swhyper
